question: This study primarily looked at Rheumatoid Arthritis, but it also mentions Multiple Sclerosis and Diabetes Type I.  It explores a relationship between gut bacteria and a genetic link to autoimmune disorders. I don't fully understand it, but it does sound very interesting.http://www.mayoclinic.org/news2012-rst/6933.html
title: Interesting study connecting gut bacteria to autoimmune diseases
